## Preview
Sort, filter and export a selection of the data using the table. An <a href="https://www.trafforddatalab.io/explore/#dataset=allotments" target="_blank">interactive map</a> is also available.

```{r preview}
datatable(df, 
          class = 'cell-border stripe',
          rownames = FALSE, 
          caption = tags$caption(
            style = 'caption-side: bottom; text-align: center; color: #555555;',
            em("Allotments in Trafford")),
          extensions = c('Scroller', 'Buttons', 'KeyTable'),
          options = list(
            keys = TRUE,
            search = list(regex = TRUE),
            searchHighlight = TRUE,
            dom = 'ft',
            buttons = list(
              list(extend = "csv", 
                   text = "Download selection")),
            deferRender = TRUE,
            scrollX = TRUE,
            scrollY = 300,
            scroller = TRUE,
            columnDefs = list(
              list(className = 'dt-left', targets = "_all")
              )))
```
